item.title: Grafitti on the bollards, 27th August
item.description:

item.title: Rat infestation at car wash, 27th August
item.description:
Rat infestation at the car wash, . There are piles of tyres being stored there, since this has happened for 2+ years has been multiplying rats, living in the tyres. The rats also have open food source as dog food left out there.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rosina Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeated flytipping on communal staircase landing, 27th August
item.description:
Someone on the first floor of Appleshaw House keeps leaving various bits of junk, furniture and miscellaneous items on the landing area of the communal stairwell. I reported this happening a few weeks ago and it happened again almost straight away after those previous things had been removed by the council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Estate Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
